items.title: Comey pleads not guilty, will look to dismiss case for vindictive prosecution
items.description: Former FBI Director James Comey pleaded not guilty Wednesday to federal charges of lying to Congress.

items.title: Arrest made in connection with Palisades Fire: Sources
items.description: The fire caused widespread destruction in Los Angeles County and killed a dozen people earlier this year.

items.title: Joan Kennedy, first wife of Sen. Edward Kennedy, has died
items.description: The first wife of the late Sen. Edward Kennedy, Joan Kennedy, died Wednesday at the age of 89

items.title: WATCH:  London police dismantle international phone theft gang
items.description: Police in London have made dozens of arrests linked to a criminal gang who are alleged to have smuggled 40,000 stolen mobile phones from the U.K. to C...
